About Me

I’m Angie: I was born in Seoul, moved to Vancouver at 2, and currently attend school in Providence, RI. I’m a sophomore computer science student at Brown University. I like good food, crossword puzzles, and trivia.

I’m always working on something, cooking something, or figuring out where to go next.

Find me lurking on Twitter.
